alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Madison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 3:44PM EST until March 09 at 2:30PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River. Eel River at Bowling Green. .Ongoing and renewed flooding will continue or develop along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers over the next 24 to 48 hours and beyond. River stages are rising again due to the one to over two and a half inches of rain received from Saturday night through this morning. Minor flooding is expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Anderson. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood waters close Edgewood Park and Grand Avenue between Alexandria Pike and Broadway. If river is rising at this level, the City of Anderson notifies residents along Hazlett Street, near W 1st Street and Madison Avenue, near W 2nd Street and Sycamore Street, and along Riverside Drive to prepare for sandbagging operations and possible evacuations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM EST Monday the stage was 10.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:30 PM EST Monday was 10.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by later this evening.
